tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Very nice guy and obviously knows his Cisco material well as he had a very successful career prior to becoming a full-time instructor. However, he does not prepare well for his classes and his lectures are reading the chapters to you in class from the online book. Some actual teaching does occur when he tells you his experiences, but not usually.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I\'m on my sixth class with this professor. I took all 4 CCNA classes with him, and am now in CCNA Security. He\'s fantastic. He\'s very knowledgeable, and is willing to help with labs as long as you show you\'ve tried to do them yourself. Highly recommend for both newbies and tech veterans.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: This is my favorite class by far. The first week was spent just talking about current events in the tech world. He focuses on information security, but not on a level we can\'t understand. You can tell he loves what he does. I hope I have many more classes with him.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I had Mr. Lamb for all four CCNA classes. He is very helpful, and very accommodating. If you work and need to be late that is not a problem. He knows the material very well.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: took ccna 1,2,3,4 all 4 semesters with mr. lamb and taking the ccna security class with him this fall. he really keeps the class interesting, he wants to help everyone do well in class and he has a very positive outlook for a very technical series of classes. i would recommend him to anyone brand new to the subject, he creates good basics.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: This is his moonlighting job. Take this class if you just need to re certify - if your a newbie, you will be lost and most of the students at night are there for work. Not good for newbies.
